Explosive Entry.name: “芝麻开门” Explosive Entry
Explosive Entry.description: 你很清楚如何制造一个令人难忘的“开门大吉”……理所当然是通过引爆炸弹来产生毁灭性的爆炸！你在门，窗，货箱或者更沉重的大门上设置炸弹。当炸药爆炸时，你可以尝试一次工程学识检定来使用破拆动作打开目标。如果炸弹在攻击骰上具有物品加值，把这个物品加值添加到工程学识的技能检定中。当然既然你要炸开条路进去，你就无法避免破坏物件或建筑。如果你的掷骰结果为大成功，作为替换改为成功。

prerequisites.value: 工程学识熟练度为大师

Reach for the Sky.name: 「举起手来！」 Reach for the Sky
Reach for the Sky.description:
需求 你持有一把已装填的单手火器。

你向天鸣枪并命令在场的所有人高举双手投降。尝试一次威吓检定以对30尺内的所有敌人执行一次挫败士气，因此行动而陷入惊惧的生物会高举双手。如果其正举起盾牌，那他就会失去这项好处，这是因为盾牌也被举起到无助于格挡攻击的位置上。所有因陷入惊惧而举起双手的生物都无法执行任何需要使用他们的手或手上所持物品才能启动的反应及自由动作，这项效果持续到他们下一回合开始时。无论结果如何， 受影响的生物会在接下来的1分钟内免疫「举起手来！」行动。

Borrow Memories.name: 「借」取记忆 Borrow Memories
Borrow Memories.description:
了解他人所想可让你知道其会做什么，或是便于你取而代之。每天一次，你可以将@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.9BnhadUO8FMLmeZ3]{精神质询 Mind Probe}作为你的内在异能法术施放，该法术使用你的职业或法术DC，取其高者。

若你对代入身份所研究的目标施放精神质询，且目标在豁免检定中失败，你可以将效果延迟到你执行代入身份行动时再触发。当你以此法运用法术效果，你可在代入身份期间维持最多10次该法术来向目标询问一个不同的问题。该法术的持续时间将变为当你问完10个问题后或是你不再代入目前的身份后结束（取其先者）。同时，你也不需要维持该法术来增加其持续时间，只需要在问问题时维持法术即可，你也不用让目标处于你的射程范围内或是建立效果线就能维持该法术。

Accurate Swing.name: Accurate Swing
Accurate Swing.description: You strike cleanly with wide, sweeping attacks to inflict maximum damage, taking advantage of your judged foe's fear to land a felling blow. If you Strike a creature you condemned with Harsh Judgment that has the frightened condition with a sweep melee weapon or a sweep unarmed attack, you gain a circumstance bonus to the Strike's damage equal to the number of weapon damage dice your weapon deals.

Accursed Clay Fist.name: 诅咒陶拳 Accursed Clay Fist
Accursed Clay Fist.description:
你的一条上臂被替换成了陶土制成的，并灌注有诅咒的奥术魔法。当你使用自己的陶土制拳头进行无武装攻击并命中时，你的目标在对抗诅咒效应的豁免骰上获得-2状态减值，维持1小时。

特殊 你的陶土拳的伤害是1d8，它失去通常的拳头拥有的灵巧和娴熟特征。

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.bvk5rwYSoTtz8QGf]{效果: 诅咒陶拳}

prerequisites.value: 无武装攻击熟练度为专家

Advanced Reanimated Companion.name: 进阶赋生伙伴 Advanced Reanimated Companion
Advanced Reanimated Companion.description: 你的丧尸构装伙伴变得更加强大，并且能够以有限的主动性来执行你更高阶的指令。它成为进阶构装伙伴。在遭遇模式下，即便你没有使用指挥仆从动作，你的构装伙伴依然可以在这一轮你的回合中使用一个动作行走或打击。

Alabaster Eyes.name: Alabaster Eyes
Alabaster Eyes.description:
In place of the normal vishkanyan golden eyes, you were born with especially perceptive snow-white eyes. You gain darkvision.

特殊 You can take this feat only at 1st level, and you can't retrain out of this feat or into this feat.

Alluring Performance.name: Alluring Performance
Alluring Performance.description:
频率 每天一次

You command the attention of those around you with an elegant display. Attempt a Performance check and compare it to the Will DC of each creature in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:15].

大成功 The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AdPVz7rbaVSRxHFg]{迷魂 Fascinated} with you for as long as you perform (unless it breaks from the fascination, as normal for the condition) and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{目眩 Dazzled} for 1 round or as long as it's fascinated, whichever is longer.

成功 The target is fascinated for 1 round and is dazzled for 1 round.

失败 The target is dazzled for 1 round.

大失败 The target is unaffected.

prerequisites.value: 表演技能熟练度为受训

Always Ready.name: 枕戈待旦 Always Ready
Always Ready.description: 经过与不死生物的大量对抗，你学会了如何掩护自己的弱点，即使孤身一人。对于等于或低于你等级的不死生物，你不会因为它@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{藏匿 Hidden}、@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]{无踪 Undetected}或夹击而@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Flat-Footed} 。然而，它仍然可以为它们的盟友提供夹击。如果你所有的敌人都是不死生物，你的先攻骰获得+1环境加值；如果不死生物伪装成了另一种生物、或另一种生物伪装成不死生物、或存在你没有注意到的非不死生物的敌人，GM决定这个加值是否有效。

Ambush Tactics.name: 伏击战术 Ambush Tactics
Ambush Tactics.description: 你花时间学习掌握了根据地形伏击敌人的最佳方案，你熟悉在特定地形中如何埋伏敌人，也通晓在这种地形里应对突袭的绝佳方式。当敌人在战斗中使用隐秘技能来决定先攻时，如果你在对应地形的学识技能达到受训熟练度，就可以选择使用对应遭遇地形的学识技能进行先攻检定。

prerequisites.value: 在特定地形学识上受训

Ancient Memories.name: 远古记忆 Ancient Memories
Ancient Memories.description: 在戈罗斯(Ghorus)时代之后的漫长岁月里，你曾经做过几乎所有的事情。 在你的每日准备过程中，你可以探索你对前世的记忆，以使你选择的一项技能受训。这个熟练度会持续到你再次每日准备。由于这个熟练度是临时的，你不能将它作为技能提升或像专长一样的永久角色选项的先决条件。

Angel of Vindication.name: 诉罪天使 Angel of Vindication
Angel of Vindication.description:
需求 你的标记目标是不死生物。

为了完成摧毁不死生物的任务，你经受了特训，就像其他刺客学习如何杀死活人一样。当你使用一把具有背刺特性的武器打击@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Flat-Footed}的不死生物敌人时，你造成额外3点精准伤害，取代1点。如果武器是+3武器，你造成额外6点精准伤害，取代2点。如果你拥有告死天使专长，你的攻击会在将不死生物的HP降低至0时将其摧毁，并且它的复活尝试——例如通过巫妖的命匣或幽灵的复苏能力——会失败，除非效果的反制级别高于你在杀死它时的等级的一半（向上取整）、或者源自神器或神。最后，如果你拥有暗杀专长，并且被标记的不死生物在对抗你的暗杀时的豁免大失败，它会被摧毁。

Annihilating Swing.name: Annihilating Swing
Annihilating Swing.description: You have learned from the brute destructive power of xulgaths and their kind. You make a melee Strike that ignores any resistances the target has. If you target a solid unattended object or surface with your Strike, you might automatically destroy it without an attack roll. If you target any object or surface with Hardness 20 or less that isn't a magic item or the effect of a spell, you destroy it. If the target object or surface is a magic item or the effect of a spell, you attempt to counteract it using your attack bonus with the Strike for the counteract check. On a successful counteract check, you destroy the object or surface unless it has Hardness greater than 20, is an artifact, or is similarly difficult to destroy. You destroy up to a 5-foot cube of an object or surface larger than Medium.

Ashen Veil.name: 灰烬面纱 Ashen Veil
Ashen Veil.description: 你在皮肤和盔甲上涂抹上灰烬或被污染的泥土，将自己隐于亡者。你对于使用视觉或生命感知的不死生物@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{隐蔽 Concealed}，并且这允许你在没有其他掩体或隐蔽来源的情况下躲藏和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.VMozDqMMuK5kpoX4]{潜行 Sneak}。这个效果持续到你使用除了躲藏、潜行、和其他秘密动作以外的动作。GM决定哪些动作会结束这一效果，但攻击、施法、激活物品等动作总是会导致效果结束。

prerequisites.value: 宗教技能熟练度为专家
隐秘技能熟练度为大师

Astonishing Explosion.name: Astonishing Explosion
Astonishing Explosion.description:
频率 每分钟一次

触发 You use @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.NlEZ0piDxg9buXCL]{Quick Alchemy} to craft an alchemical bomb that deals splash damage and is at least 2 levels lower than your @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Pe0zmIqyTBc2Td0I]{高阶炼金术 Advanced Alchemy} level.

Your bomb incorporates an explosive spark of wonder that leaves witnesses dumbfounded. Any target hit by your Strike with the bomb is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AdPVz7rbaVSRxHFg]{迷魂 Fascinated} by you for 1 round. On a critical success, the target is also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{震慑 Stunned 1}.

Axe Climber.name: 持斧攀爬者 Axe Climber
Axe Climber.description: 当你攀爬木质表面，并且每只手都有一把@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.LGgvev6AV0So8tP9]{短柄斧 Hatchet}或是@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.War0uyLBx1jA0Ge7]{战斧 Battle Axe}时，你获得等同于你正常速度一半的攀爬速度。你必须依旧拥有两条可供攀爬的双腿，并且在攀爬的过程中不可使用任何一把斧子。当你每只手都有一把@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.RbM4HvPyrZ4YJxRc]{轻型镐 Light Pick}时，这个专长还可以用于攀爬冰面。

Axe Thrower.name: 掷斧者 Axe Thrower
Axe Thrower.description: 你已经掌握了各式各样斧类的重量和平衡，可以轻松抛掷它们。任何你持握的单手斧类武器都拥有10尺射程的投掷特征。对于已经拥有投掷特征的斧子，这个射程增加10尺。当你使用投掷斧武器进行攻击检定大成功时，你应用该武器的重击专精效果。

Banishing Blow.name: Banishing Blow
Banishing Blow.description:
触发 You use your champion's reaction, triggered by a fiend within your reach.

The erratic teleportation magic you experienced in the Kortos Mounts has taught you a few tricks. You attempt an Athletics check to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.7blmbDrQFNfdT731]{推撞 Shove} the fiend that triggered your champion's reaction; on a success, the target can't teleport or summon creatures for 1 minute. On a critical success, the target is also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{震慑 Stunned 1} and can't teleport or summon creatures for 1 hour, and if you are on your home plane and the target is a fiend of level 18 or lower from another plane, it is also banished to its home plane. Your multiple attack penalty doesn't apply to this attack.

Bend Space.name: Bend Space
Bend Space.description: Not even space itself is a match for the unleashed power of your mind. You can cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.69L70wKfGDY66Mk9]{Teleport} as an innate occult spell. You don't need to touch creatures to target them with this innate spell as long as they're in range of your empathic sense.

Bless Shield.name: 祝福之盾 Bless Shield
Bless Shield.description: 你的祷告化作防护，神祇的祝福流淌过你的盾牌表面。直到你的下一个回合开始，你的盾牌、盾凸、盾刺获得幽冥符文的效果。此外，你受到的虚体生物的打击伤害也可以触发你的盾格格挡反应，即使这不是物理伤害。

Blessing of the Sun Gods.name: Blessing of the Sun Gods
Blessing of the Sun Gods.description:
The Old Sun Gods share their power with you. Select the ambition, cities, darkness, dreams, family, fire, freedom, healing, moon, passion, or sun domain. You gain an initial domain spell for that domain. If you don't already have one, you gain a focus pool of 1 Focus Point, which you can regain using the Refocus activity to pray to the Old Sun Gods; if you already have a focus pool, increase the number of Focus Points in your focus pool by 1.

Your Bright Lion focus spells are divine spells; you become trained in divine spell attacks and spell DCs, using Charisma as your spellcasting ability score.

特殊 You can select this feat multiple times, selecting a different domain each time and gaining its domain spell.

Breath of Calamity.name: Breath of Calamity
Breath of Calamity.description: Your roar shakes the earth and splits the heavens. Once per day, you can cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.TDNlDWbYb58Y55Da]{Chain Lightning} as a 7th-level innate occult spell. Any creature that critically fails its save against the spell is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{目盲 Blinded} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.9PR9y0bi4JPKnHPR]{耳聋 Deafened} for 1 round.

Cannibalize Magic.name: Cannibalize Magic
Cannibalize Magic.description:
The fey magic inside of you is a vital part of your body, and you can steal other sources of magic to replenish yours. You can draw power from your magical equipment to replenish your health. You drain one of your invested items, in the process regaining Hit Points equal to double the item's level. In addition, you can attempt a counteract check with a total bonus equal to 10 + the drained item's level against one effect that gave you the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.3uh1r86TzbQvosxv]{毁灭 Doomed}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{疲乏 Fatigued}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed} condition. If you succeed, you reduce the chosen condition's value by 1. An item drained by this action becomes non-magical until the next time you make your daily preparations.

特殊 This feat gains the trait appropriate for your ancestry (human for human, goblin for goblin, etc.).

Canopy Sight.name: Canopy Sight
Canopy Sight.description: You can see equally well even in dense jungles where only a small amount of light shines through. You gain low-light vision.

Cleansing Light.name: Cleansing Light
Cleansing Light.description:
频率 每天一次

A burst of light from your horn cleanses your allies of ailments and sends your foes reeling. You and all allies in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:20] benefit from a 4th-level @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.SnaLVgxZ9ryUFmUr]{Restoration} spell. All enemies within the emanation are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{目眩 Dazzled} until the end of your next turn.

Climbing Tail.name: Climbing Tail
Climbing Tail.description: Your tail makes it much easier for you to climb. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Athletics checks to Climb, you gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.09PurtIanNUPfNRq]{Combat Climber} skill feat, and you reduce the number of free hands required to Climb or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.ge56Lu1xXVFYUnLP]{摔绊 Trip} by one.

Clockwork Reanimator Dedication.name: 发条赋生者入门 Clockwork Reanimator Dedication
Clockwork Reanimator Dedication.description:
你通过巧妙的工程让尸体获得生命。你将获得一个原型构装伙伴作为你的仆从。和普通的构装伙伴不同，你的伙伴是一具由发条装置和科技力量唤起的尸体。

特殊 在你从@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.journals.vx5FGEG34AxI2dow.JournalEntryPage.6DgCLFEGEHvqmy7Y]{发条赋生者 Clockwork Reanimator}变体获得另外两个其他专长之前，你无法选择其他入门专长。如果你重训此专长，你会失去从变体学到的仪式。

prerequisites.value: 手艺技能熟练度为受训

Cloud Walk.description: Your growing link to cloud dragons has granted you the ability to walk on clouds. Once per hour, you can cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.b5sGjGlBf58f8jn0]{Air Walk} on yourself as an innate arcane spell, but only to walk on clouds or fog.

Cold Minded.name: Cold Minded
Cold Minded.description: The subtle strands of beguiling magic leave little impression on your mind. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to saving throws against emotion effects, and whenever you roll a success on a saving throw against an emotion effect, you get a critical success instead.

Community Knowledge.name: Community Knowledge
Community Knowledge.description:
频率 每小时一次

触发 You attempt a skill check requiring 3 actions or fewer.

You commune with the psychic echoes of your ancestors and community, channeling their experiences into yourself. You gain a +2 status bonus on the triggering skill check.

Consolidated Overlay Panopticon.name: 统筹增强全景图 Consolidated Overlay Panopticon
Consolidated Overlay Panopticon.description:
你自愿参加一个有争议的实验程序，安装发条义眼。这些眼睛将你看到的东西传送到盾勋执法官总部，总部整合并分析环境数据——青铜时/浪涌时概率、压力、温度、风向等等，并将它们反馈给你。钢铁卿（Ironmaster）会在不断努力铲除警察腐败的过程中，定期审查信息档案。当你使用统筹增强全景图时，你会给义眼充电；在接下来的一分钟里，你会获得黑暗视觉和昏暗视觉，并且在基于视觉的察觉检定时获得+1状态加值。即使在义眼没有充能的情况下，你也能保持正常的视觉。

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.qSKVcw6brzrvfhUM]{效果: 统筹增强全景图}

Counterclockwork Focus.name: 专注对抗发条装置 Counterclockwork Focus
Counterclockwork Focus.description:
频率 每轮一次

你明白执法方式需要适应技术和奥法的不断变化创新。你在特殊武器和战术方面的训练使你有机会获得不寻常的技术来应对与发条装置和魔法有关的犯罪。你在已装填的火器上使用特殊的添加物。在你回合结束前，下一次使用该火器进行打击时，如果目标是构装体，你造成额外的2d6伤害，并且你可以将弹药材质视为寒铁或精金（由你选择）。在18级时，额外伤害增加到3d6，并且你可以将弹药材质视为山铜。

Crimson Oath Devotion.name: 献身绯红誓言 Crimson Oath Devotion
Crimson Oath Devotion.description: 你已经将绯红誓言化作了自己的一部分；你会在梦中默念、在行进时低声吟诵。你的神术的法术DC和法术攻击的熟练提升至专家。如果你自上次进行再聚能以来花费了至少2点聚能点，那么在你进行再聚能时会恢复2点聚能点而不是1点。

Crystal Luminescence.name: Crystal Luminescence
Crystal Luminescence.description:
Your horn glows with bioluminescent color, casting bright light in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:20] (and dim light for the next 20 feet). This light can be any color. The most common colors are blue and purple, except for trogloshi, who normally shed white light. The light shuts off when you take this action again or fall @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{失去意识 Unconscious}.

If a spell or ability would activate your glowing horn while Crystal Luminescence is active, it instead increases the radius of the bright light and dim light by 10 feet each until the start of your next turn. This isn't cumulative, so using another such ability doesn't increase the radius again.

特殊 If you have the trogloshi heritage, you can select this feat a second time (in addition to gaining it automatically from your heritage). If you do, you increase the area to a @Template[type:emanation|distance:40] (and dim light for the next 40 feet). In addition, you can use Crystal Luminescence as a free action the first time you use it on each of your turns.

Dangle (Vanara).name: Dangle (Vanara)
Dangle (Vanara).description: You can hang by your tail from any suitable anchor point, such as a tree branch, balcony, or rocky outcropping (subject to the GM's discretion), typically while climbing. While hanging, you have free use of all your other limbs, so you can perform tasks that require both hands, such as firing a bow or swinging a bo staff. You can Release your tail to drop down, and you cease hanging if you take an action with the move trait.

Darting Monkey.name: Darting Monkey
Darting Monkey.description: You have a heightened awareness in combat, and your darting strikes prevent your foes from distracting you or breaking your focus. When you hit a creature of your level or lower while that creature is flanking you, flanking doesn't make you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Flat-Footed} to that creature. This benefit lasts until the start of your next turn or until the creature moves, whichever comes first. The creature can still help its other allies flank.

Debilitating Venom.name: Debilitating Venom
Debilitating Venom.description:
Your venom is particularly potent, affecting targets in different ways. When you gain this feat, select one of the following debilitations. When you use Envenom, you can choose to apply a debilitation to your venom to adjust its effects. The changes to each stage of the venom are listed. You can apply only one debilitation to your venom.

  • Hampering (level 5)

    Stage 1 –5-foot status penalty to Speed

    Stage 2 –5-foot status penalty to Speed

    Stage 3 –10-foot status penalty to Speed

  • Stumbling (level 5)

    Stage 1 no adjustment

    Stage 2 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Flat-Footed}

    Stage 3 flat-footed and a –5-foot penalty to Speed

特殊 You can select this feat a second time to gain the other debilitation.

Deflecting Cloud.name: Deflecting Cloud
Deflecting Cloud.description:
频率 once every 10 minutes

触发 You are the target of a ranged attack.

需求 You are aware of the attack and currently have dragon wings active.

You've mastered a defensive technique unique to the ancient dragons of Bloodsalt: beating your wings to create a billowing cloud of mist. You become momentarily @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{藏匿 Hidden} from the triggering attack if vision is the attacker's only precise sense. Normally this means the attacker must succeed at a @Check[type:flat|dc:11|name:Hidden Flat Check|traits:hidden|showDC:owner] check to target you. You also gain a +4 circumstance bonus to AC against the triggering attack.

Defy Fey.name: Defy Fey
Defy Fey.description: You are keen to the wiles of the fey and can usually shake off their magic. Whenever you fail, but don't critically fail, a save against a spell with a duration of at least 1 round cast by a fey creature, you can attempt a second save against the original DC at the start of your next turn to end any lingering effects the spell might have. This can end persistent damage caused by a spell but can't reverse any effects that have been resolved already (such as damage dealt when the spell was cast).

Denier of Destruction.name: Denier of Destruction
Denier of Destruction.description:
需求 You have a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.rfZpqmj0AIIdkVIs]{治疗术 Heal} spell prepared and you aren't @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Flat-Footed} to the source of the damage.

触发 Any ally within 30 feet that you can heal with your 治疗术 Heal spell would take damage from an attack or effect from a source you can observe.

You can manipulate the same energies that the aeon orbs use to sustain life. You cast 治疗术 Heal on the triggering target. Instead of its normal effects, the 治疗术 Heal spell reduces the triggering damage by an amount equal to the Hit Points a 1-action 治疗术 Heal spell of that level would have recovered. As usual, if this reduces the damage to 0, it might also remove additional effects of the triggering attack, such as injury poisons.

Discerning Gaze.name: Discerning Gaze
Discerning Gaze.description:
You have a sense for when people are lying. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus on your secret Perception checks to Sense Motive.

If you use Sense Motive on a creature you have currently condemned with Harsh Judgment, your GM rolls the Perception check twice and takes the higher result (this is a fortune effect).

Disruptive Stare.name: Disruptive Stare
Disruptive Stare.description:
触发 A creature within 30 feet attempts to Cast a Spell with the concentrate trait.

Your frigid gaze can turn a foe's blood to ice. The triggering creature must attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:resolve(@actor.attributes.classOrSpellDC.value)] save against your class DC or spell DC, whichever is higher. It then becomes temporarily immune for 24 hours.

失败 The triggering spell takes a –2 status penalty to its spell attack rolls and DCs.

大失败 The triggering spell is disrupted.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.QcReJp7kgURdQCGz]{效果: Disruptive Stare}

Drain Emotion.name: Drain Emotion
Drain Emotion.description:
You touch an adjacent creature and attempt to draw out its excess emotion. Attempt a counteract check against a single emotion or fear effect affecting the touched creature. If you succeed, you gain temporary Hit Points equal to your level for a number of rounds equal to your Charisma modifier (minimum 1 round).

特殊 This feat gains the trait appropriate for your ancestry (human for human, goblin for goblin, etc.).

Drive Back.name: 迫退 Drive Back
Drive Back.description:
获取条件 你是终焉之墙骑士

触发 一个在你触及内的敌人打击一个邻接你的盟友。

你举起了你的盾牌。你推搡你的敌人，试图介入敌人和你的盟友之间。你尝试用你的盾牌@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.7blmbDrQFNfdT731]{推撞 Shove}触发的敌人让他退后，就好像你用盾牌攻击一样。你的盾牌在这次推撞尝试中具有猛推特性。如果推撞成功，你打乱敌人的进攻时机，因而敌人对你的盟友的攻击骰受到-1环境减值。

Eclipsed Vitality.name: 遮掩命源 Eclipsed Vitality
Eclipsed Vitality.description: 你用灰烬包裹自己，隐藏起自己的活物本质，以抵抗不死生物的感知生命能力。在你对抗生命感知时，你的@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.IE2nThCmoyhQA0Jn]{避人耳目 Avoiding Notice}、@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.XMcnh4cSI32tljXa]{躲藏 Hiding}和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.VMozDqMMuK5kpoX4]{潜行 Sneaking}总是视为有所防备，并且你对所有仅使用精确生命感知来注意你的生物保持@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{隐蔽 Concealed}。

prerequisites.value: 隐秘技能熟练度为大师

Efficient Explorer.name: 高效探险家 Efficient Explorer
Efficient Explorer.description: 你能够更有效率地探索未知地域。如果你身处一个六角格中，而且你对它的主要地形的学识技能达到受训熟练度，你就可以给予队伍一个额外的六角格探索行动。

prerequisites.value: 在特定地形学识上受训

Eldritch Calm.name: Eldritch Calm
Eldritch Calm.description:
Your fey heritage has altered your mindset to more resemble the uncanny perspective of the fey. While you are not emotionless, and indeed might be prone to fits of odd moods and tempers, many perceive you as having an aura of unshakable tranquility. When you roll a critical failure against an emotion or fear effect, you get a failure instead. Once per day in place of attempting a saving throw against an emotion or fear effect, you can automatically treat your result as though you had rolled a 20; this is a fortune effect. However, your extraordinary emotional detachment makes it difficult to encourage you. You reduce any bonus you gain from an emotion effect by 1.

特殊 This feat gains the trait appropriate for your ancestry (human for human, goblin for goblin, etc.).

Embodied Dragoon Subjectivity.name: Embodied Dragoon Subjectivity
Embodied Dragoon Subjectivity.description: When your allies call for swift reinforcements or lightning raids, you're ready to answer. Your titanic form encompasses both cavalry and rider so that you're able to traverse vast distances and exploit opportunities in the theater of war. Your pores distend and extrude copious amounts of blood, subcutaneous fat, and lymphatic fluid for you to harden and flash-sculpt into gliding wings or a swift-hurtling mount. You can cast feather fall and phantom steed each once per day as innate occult spells. When you cast feather fall in this way, gliding wings slow your fall, and when you cast phantom steed in this way, the steed physically protrudes from your own lower body. Neither of these cosmetic changes alter the spells' effects; for example, foes can still attack the phantom steed as normal.

Emotional Partitions.name: Emotional Partitions
Emotional Partitions.description: You have created strong mental partitions in your mind to filter out negative emotional influences. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus on saving throws against emotion effects. If you roll a success on a saving throw against an emotion effect, you get a critical success instead.

Empathic Calm.name: Empathic Calm
Empathic Calm.description: Once per day, you can cast either @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.b515AZlB0sridKSq]{Calm Emotions} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.8xRzLhwGL7Dgy3EZ]{Sanctuary} as an innate occult spell, heightened to half your level rounded up.

Endless Memories.name: 无尽记忆 Endless Memories
Endless Memories.description: 你经历过一千次生命，做过十万件事情。当你使用@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.ptEOt3lqjxUnAW62]{远古记忆 Ancient Memories}选择一种技能使其受训时，你也可以选择一种你已受训的技能并使该技能变为专家熟练度。这会持续到你的远古记忆结束为止。当远古记忆和无尽记忆的效果结束时，您可以重训你的一项技能提升。你从这次重训中获得的技能提升必须是你在古代记忆中选择变为受训的技能，或者你在无尽记忆中选择变为专家的技能。

Endurance of the Rooted Tree.name: Endurance of the Rooted Tree
Endurance of the Rooted Tree.description:
Just as the Vale of Aroden retains light and life despite inhospitable surroundings, you can sustain yourself regardless of your environment. You don't need to eat, drink, or breathe.

In addition, you can cast the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.qJZZdYBdNaWRJFER]{Wholeness of Body} ki spell almost effortlessly. You can cast it as a free action that triggers at the start of your turn.

Envenom Strike.name: Envenom Strike
Envenom Strike.description: You spit venom onto a weapon you're holding or a weapon held by a willing creature within 30 feet; you can also use this ability to envenom your nagaji fangs unarmed attack. If the next Strike with the chosen weapon before the start of your next turn hits and deals damage, the Strike deals an additional 2d6 poison damage.

prerequisites.value: you possess a Strike from a nagaji heritage or ancestry feat that deals poison damage

Equitable Defense.name: 合理防御 Equitable Defense
Equitable Defense.description:
触发 你受到重击伤害。

在痛苦中咬紧牙关，你摆好姿势反击。你对重击伤害获得相当于你等级一半的抗力。只要你在攻击后仍有意识，你就可以通过交互动作来重新装填你目前所持有的武器或站立。在你下一个回合结束前，你在对重击你的生物进行的下一次攻击上获得+1的环境加值。

Eternal Memories.name: 永恒记忆 Eternal Memories
Eternal Memories.description:
频率 每天一次

你的寿命比大多数人意识到还要长，而且由于你许多世的修行，你现在几乎记得每个前代的一切。你检索你的记忆，改变你用远古记忆和无尽记忆选择的技能。

Execution.name: Execution
Execution.description:
需求 You have condemned a foe with Harsh Judgment.

You swing wide, attempting to behead your condemned foe. Make a melee Strike against your condemned foe. If you hit, your condemned foe takes [[/r (8d6)[precision]]]{8d6 extra precision伤害} with a basic Fortitude save against your class DC or spell DC, whichever is higher. If the condemned foe is reduced to 0 Hit Points by the execution and requires a head to live, they die. For creatures with multiple heads, this usually kills the creature only if you sever its last head. The creature then becomes temporarily immune to your Execution for 1 day.

Executioner Weapon Training.name: Executioner Weapon Training
Executioner Weapon Training.description:
Your Gray Gardener training has made you deeply skilled with the weapons that execute with a swift chop to the neck. You become trained with the following weapons: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.War0uyLBx1jA0Ge7]{Battle Axe}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.XGtIUZ4ZNKuFx1uL]{弯刃大刀 Falchion}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.8COlYvHe6hKCXY8x]{Greataxe}, and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.grmaV4GdoGD7sKbn]{弯刀 Scimitar}.

Whenever you gain a class feature that grants you expert or greater proficiency with a given weapon or weapons, you also gain that proficiency for these weapons.

Familiar Foe.name: 知己知彼 Familiar Foe
Familiar Foe.description: 你常常直面不死生物，只要一瞥就能认出它们。在关于不死生物的回忆知识的技能检定上，你获得+1环境加值。每当你在该检定中骰出大失败，你得到失败的结果。

prerequisites.value: 宗教技能或不死学识熟练度为专家

Faultspawn.name: Faultspawn
Faultspawn.description:
You bear a grudge, inherited from a blasphemous asura forebear in your bloodline, against a particular deity and their works. You also have some vestigial signs of your previous incarnation, such as a second set of shoulder blades without usable arms, a set of mostly closed eyes where no eyes belong, or strange scarring reminiscent of a mouth.

You gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.e5JscXqvBUC867oo]{Find Fault} reaction.

Fey Tracker.name: Fey Tracker
Fey Tracker.description: You are exceptionally skilled at noticing the subtle techniques fey use to avoid notice. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Survival checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.EA5vuSgJfiHH7plD]{Track} fey creatures, to Perception checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ]{搜索 Seek} for @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{藏匿 Hidden} fey, and to your Perception DC to resist a fey creature's attempt to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.GkmbTGfg8KcgynOA]{Create a Diversion}.

Fey Transcendence.name: Fey Transcendence
Fey Transcendence.description:
You become a powerful fey creature, gaining strengths tied to the First World but also some of the weakness against which all fey must contend. You gain a +2 status bonus to saves against illusion, emotion, and enchantment effects, and you can use Diplomacy to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.OX4fy22hQgUHDr0q]{Make an Impression} on and to make very simple @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.DCb62iCBrJXy0Ik6]{Requests} of animals and plants. You regain twice the number of Hit Points when resting in a natural wooded area, such as a forest or jungle. You have weakness to cold iron equal to half your level.

特殊 This feat gains the trait appropriate for your ancestry (human for human, goblin for goblin, etc.).

Fighting Horn.name: Fighting Horn
Fighting Horn.description:
You can modify the size and shape of your horn over time using your mental powers. Choose two of the following weapon traits: disarm, grapple, shove, and trip. Your horn gains the chosen traits.

特殊 You can take this feat a second time, adding the traits you didn't choose when you first took it.

Flashing Shield.name: 闪耀之盾 Flashing Shield
Flashing Shield.description:
触发 你使用盾牌格挡反应，并且触发的敌人是不死生物且与你相邻。

当你格挡攻击时，你的盾牌闪耀着圣光，用信仰之力灼烧这个不死生物。触发的不死生物受到等于你等级一半的正能量伤害，并且@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Flat-Footed}一轮。

Flexible Form.name: 灵巧身形 Flexible Form
Flexible Form.description: 你的身体像树苗一样柔软，能够弯曲而不折断。你的特技技能受训，如果你的挤入空间检定成功，你会得到大成功结果。如果你的特技技能已自动受训（例如，来自你的背景或职业），变为你选择一项技能受训。

prerequisites.value: 除坚如橡树外的任何传承

Flower MAgic.name: 花之魔法 Flower MAgic
Flower MAgic.description: 世界上的某些魔法很容易流过你的汁液。 你每天可以将@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.YWrfKetOqDwVFut7]{树肤术 Barkskin}和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.dileJ0Yxqg76LMvu]{树化术 Tree Shape}作为 2环奥术内在法术施放一次。 你以这种方式施展的树化术会将你变成一株大型开花植物，如玫瑰丛或丁香花丛，而不是一棵树。

For Love, For Lightning.name: 为了爱，赐与雷霆 For Love, For Lightning
For Love, For Lightning.description:
获取条件 为克拉瑞希·艾奥梅达完成一个特殊任务的角色能够获取这项能力。

传言，这种技术是由在半月(half-moon)期间为克拉瑞希·艾奥梅达(Clarethe Iomedar)执行任务的骑士首创，而许多绯红复国者都掌握了它。你学会@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.mtxMpGWpwwWSbySj]{为了爱，赐与雷霆 For Love, For Lightning}聚能法术。如果你没有聚能池，你获得一个含有1点聚能点的聚能池，你可以通过背诵绯红誓言并冥想教义来再聚能；如果你已经有聚能池，你的聚能池中的聚能点数增加1。你的复国骑士聚能法术是神术法术；当你获得这个专长时，你受训于神术的法术攻击和法术DC。魅力是复国骑士聚能法术的施法关键属性。

Fortified Mind.name: Fortified Mind
Fortified Mind.description: Your mind is unusually resilient and resistant to influence. When you would gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AdPVz7rbaVSRxHFg]{迷魂 Fascinated} or stupefied condition, you can attempt a @Check[type:flat|dc:17]. On a success, you don't gain the fascinated or stupefied condition.

Frightful Condemnation.name: Frightful Condemnation
Frightful Condemnation.description:
触发 You hit your condemned foe with a melee Strike in the same turn during which you condemned it with Harsh Judgment.

需求 You have condemned a foe to death with Harsh Judgment.

Your willingness to follow through on your pitiless judgment is frightful to the person you have condemned, and they begin to dread what you will do to them next. Your condemned foe is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 1}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 2} if the triggering Strike was a critical hit.

Gardener's Resolve.name: Gardener's Resolve
Gardener's Resolve.description:
频率 每天一次

触发 You roll a failure (but not a critical failure) on a Will save against a fear effect.

The Gray Gardeners are known for having nerves of steel and an unbreakable resolve. When you would be overwhelmed by terror, you can draw upon this resolve to keep your composure and remain undaunted. You take mental damage equal to twice your level, and the saving throw is a success.

Ghoran Lore.name: 蒿兰学识 Ghoran Lore
Ghoran Lore.description: 蒿兰人最初的记忆是他们被创造的记忆，即使在数千年后，这些记忆也从未因你而消失。你的奥法和自然技能受训。如果你的其中一项技能已自动受训（例如，来自你的背景或职业），变为你选择一项技能受训。 你的蒿兰学识(Ghoran Lore)也会受训。

Ghoran Weapon Expertise.name: 蒿兰武器专家 Ghoran Weapon Expertise
Ghoran Weapon Expertise.description: 就好像你已经训练了一千年。每当你的职业特性让你在给定武器上达到专家或更高的熟练度时，你都在大砍刀、巨木棒、短柄斧、巨镰和镰刀和所有你已受训的蒿兰武器上达到同样的熟练度。

Ghoran Weapon Familiarity.name: 蒿兰武器熟悉 Ghoran Weapon Familiarity
Ghoran Weapon Familiarity.description: 在你漫长的生活中，你有机会练习使用传统的蒿兰武器。你对大砍刀、巨木棒、短柄斧、巨镰和镰刀受训。此外，你还允许使用所有罕见的蒿兰武器。在确定你的熟练度时，军用蒿兰武器视为简易武器，进阶蒿兰武器视为军用武器。

Ghoran Weapon Practice.name: 蒿兰武器训练 Ghoran Weapon Practice
Ghoran Weapon Practice.description: 通过大量练习，前世战斗的记忆如潮水般涌来。 每当你使用大砍刀、巨木棒、短柄斧、巨镰和镰刀或蒿兰武器造成重击时，你都会应用武器的重击专精效果。

Ghoran's Wrath.name: 蒿兰之怒 Ghoran's Wrath
Ghoran's Wrath.description: 你与大自然有着如此紧密的联系，你可以激发它攻击那些威胁你的人。你可以每小时一次将@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.YtBZq49N4Um1cwm7]{自然复仇 Nature's Reprisal}作为原能内在法术施展一次。

Giant Hunter.name: 巨人猎手 Giant Hunter
Giant Hunter.description:
你研习有关巨人的知识，高效地猎杀它们。当你看到巨人时，你可以用自由动作使用@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.JYi4MnsdFu618hPm]{猎杀目标 Hunt Prey}，指定该巨人作为你的猎物。

即便你还没有使用回忆知识辨识巨人，你也可以使用这个自由动作。但这一增益不适用于伪装成其他生物的巨人，GM可以决定这一增益是否适用于伪装为巨人的生物。

Giant Slayer.name: 巨人杀手 Giant Slayer
Giant Slayer.description: 你那精准的攻击可以击倒强大的巨人。如果你在同一轮中两次对同一个巨人造成重击，则目标必须成功进行@Check[type:fortitude|dc:resolve(@actor.attributes.classDC.value)]豁免，否则死亡。该豁免使用你的职业DC。

Glamour.name: Glamour
Glamour.description:
You unlock a new level of fey power and can manipulate the perceptions of others using a font of First World magic. You gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.DdXKfIjDtORUtUvY]{Fey Glamour} focus spell as a primal spell that doesn't have the sorcerer trait. If you don't already have a focus pool, you gain a focus pool of 1 Focus Point.

特殊 This feat gains the trait appropriate for your ancestry (human for human, goblin for goblin, etc.).

Glass Skin.name: 玻璃皮肤 Glass Skin
Glass Skin.description:
先决条件 你目睹了美杜莎阿莱西娅的死亡，在她毁灭之后，她的肉体玻璃化能力被你继承。

即便对你来说是个迷，但你的血液和肉体还是掌握了的秘法玻璃技艺之秘。你的一部分皮肤会毫无征兆地发出玻璃的反光。通过将玻璃聚集起来，你能够制造一个强大的魔法黑曜石保护层。每日1次，你能以内在原能法术的形式对自己施放@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.2BV2yYPfVJ5zirZt]{石肤术 Stoneskin}，只是法术覆盖你的是一层玻璃而不是石头。在这个内在石肤术生效的过程中，你获得震碎玻璃反应动作。在18级时，石肤术升阶到6环而不是4环。

震碎玻璃 Shatter Glass r

触发 一个相邻生物以近战武器或非武装攻击打击你并且造成伤害；

需求 你的内在石肤术正在生效；

效果 你震碎你的一部分玻璃皮肤来伤害攻击者。攻击者受到[[/r 3d10[slashing]]]伤害并且石肤术的持续时间减少1分钟。在14级时，伤害增加到[[/r 4d10[slashing]]]伤害，并且在18级时伤害增加到[[/r 5d10[slashing]]]伤害。

Godless Healing.name: Godless Healing
Godless Healing.description: You recover an additional 5 Hit Points from a successful attempt to Treat your Wounds or use Battle Medicine on you. After you or an ally use Battle Medicine on you, you become temporarily immune to that Battle Medicine for only 1 hour, instead of 1 day.

Golem Grafter Dedication.name: 魔像植装者入门 Golem Grafter Dedication
Golem Grafter Dedication.description:
你的肉体被进行了与加固血肉魔像的皮肤同种的奥法和炼金操作。增加你的最大HP，数值等同于你的等级。你获得物理伤害抗力（精金除外），数值等同于你从魔像植装者变体中获得的职业专长数量。

特殊 除非你已经从@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.journals.vx5FGEG34AxI2dow.JournalEntryPage.qlQSYjCwnoCzfto2]{魔像植装者 Golem Grafter}变体中获得了另外两个专长，否则你不能选择其他入门专长。

prerequisites.value: 奥法和手艺技能熟练度为专家, 或一个在上述技能上为专家的盟友愿意增强你

Grand Dance.name: Grand Dance
Grand Dance.description:
需求 You're in Masquerade of Seasons Stance.

You can summon the full magic of Bhopan's grand dance. Stride up to your Speed; during this Stride, you can walk on air as if it were solid ground. You can ascend and descend in this way at a maximum of a 45-degree angle. You must end your Stride on a surface that can support you or you fall.

Grave Sight.name: 死坟视觉 Grave Sight
Grave Sight.description: 你对不死生物的感知力提高了。你会能够在60尺的范围内感知不死生物，这是一种模糊感官：一种不舒服的感觉散发着腐烂的气味，与你的灵魂擦身而过。当靠近一个不死生物时，你可以感知到它的存在，但它会具有@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{藏匿 Hidden}状态，而非@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.1wQY3JYyhMYeeV2G]{可见 Observed}。使用伪装或其他方式尝试隐藏自己的不死生物必须尝试对抗你的察觉DC的欺骗或隐匿检定来隐藏它的存在。如果该生物成功了，它就处于无踪状态，并且你必须使用@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ]{搜索 Seek}基本动作来找到该生物。与听觉和其他模糊感官一样，你仍然需要使用搜索来定位一个无踪生物。

Gravelands Herbalist.name: 死坟末土草药师 Gravelands Herbalist
Gravelands Herbalist.description:
获取条件 你是终焉之墙骑士

你在终焉之墙骑士团学会了如何制造与改进@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.VeCNWhvEr82ZNoSV]{终焉之墙浓汤 Lastwall Soup}。将终焉之墙浓汤添加到你的草药列表。10级时，你可以制作@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.VcEd9Bh4q5vQfpLv]{改良终焉之墙浓汤 Lastwall Soup (Improved)}，它给予+3物品加值。18级时，你可以制作@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.ed8gAxli6Of58kAM]{高等终焉之墙浓汤 Lastwall Soup (Greater)}，它给予+4物品加值，并且它的营养价值会在你摄入后10分钟内给予你10临时HP。

prerequisites.value: 宗教技能熟练度为受训

Greater Enhance Venom.name: Greater Enhance Venom
Greater Enhance Venom.description:
You upgrade the vishkanyan venom you can apply with @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.s4V7JWSMF9JPJAeX]{Envenom} to greater vishkanyan venom. Envenom's frequency becomes once per minute.

Greater Vishkanyan Venom (level 17)

频率 每分钟一次

Saving Throw @Check[type:fortitude|dc:resolve(@actor.attributes.classOrSpellDC.value)]

Maximum Duration 6 rounds

Stage 1 [[/r 7d6[poison]]]伤害 (1 round)

Stage 2 [[/r 9d6[poison]]]伤害 (1 round)

Stage 3 [[/r 11d6[poison]]]伤害 (1 round)

Greater Sun Blessing.name: Greater Sun Blessing
Greater Sun Blessing.description:
Your connection to the Old Sun Gods grows stronger. You gain an advanced domain spell from a domain you chose with Blessing of the Sun Gods. Increase the number of Focus Points in your focus pool by 1.

特殊 You can select this feat multiple times. Each time you do so, you must select a different domain for which you have an initial domain spell from Blessing of the Sun Gods.

Greenwatch Initiate.name: Greenwatch Initiate
Greenwatch Initiate.description: You’ve received the basic training developed for all Greenwatch recruits. You become an expert in Survival and gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.urQZwmzg2kS53vd5]{Experienced Tracker} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.tGIXuk0XeWmG04CX]{Survey Wildlife} skill feats.

prerequisites.value: 生存技能熟练度为受训

Greenwatch Veteran.name: Greenwatch Veteran
Greenwatch Veteran.description:
触发 Your turn starts, and you're in combat against a creature you spent at least 10 minutes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.EA5vuSgJfiHH7plD]{Tracking}.

Your time spent tracking your target allows you to quickly identify its weaknesses and relay them to your allies. Attempt a Recall Knowledge check against the creature you were @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.EA5vuSgJfiHH7plD]{Tracking}. On a success, you always know the creature's greatest weakness and highest resistance or immunity, in addition to any other information the check would typically provide. You immediately use a quick series of hand gestures to signal this information to any allies who can see you.

Greenwatcher.name: Greenwatcher
Greenwatcher.description: Your experience fighting against and alongside fey creatures is nearly unrivaled. Any weapon you wield or unarmed attack you make against a fey creature is treated as cold iron. Whenever you critically fail a save against a spell cast by a fey creature, it's instead treated as a normal failure. Whenever you critically succeed on a Strike against a fey creature, the target is immediately subject to the effects of a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.HRb2doyaLtaoCfi3]{Faerie Fire} spell. For the purposes of counteracting this effect, it's an innate 2nd-level primal spell.

Guarded Thoughts.name: Guarded Thoughts
Guarded Thoughts.description: Your mind, like a dark naga's, foils attempts to read your thoughts. Any effect that specifically attempts to read your mind to glean information must succeed at a counteract check against the higher of your class DC or your spell DC to do so successfully; otherwise, it gains no information. The counteract level is equal to half your level rounded up.

Guided by the Stars.name: Guided by the Stars
Guided by the Stars.description:
频率 每天一次

触发 You are about to attempt a skill check or saving throw.

The stars grant you insights that guide your actions. You roll twice and take the better result. If it's night and you can see the stars, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to the triggering roll.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.raLQ458uiyd3lI2K]{效果: Guided by the Stars}

Hamstring Strike.name: Hamstring Strike
Hamstring Strike.description: You slow your foes with a well-aimed attack. Make a Strike against your hunted prey with a -2 penalty. If you hit your prey, the creature takes a -5-foot status penalty to Speed. If you critically hit your prey, the creature takes a -10-foot status penalty to Speed. A creature immune to bleed damage does not take this penalty. The penalty can be removed using any method that removes persistent bleed damage or offers a flat check to do so, such as Administer First Aid.

Harsh Judgement.name: Harsh Judgement
Harsh Judgement.description:
Choose one creature you can see, and loudly declare the creature's life forfeit by your judgment. That creature becomes your condemned foe until they are defeated, you use Harsh Judgment on a different creature, or the encounter ends. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Perception checks to Seek your condemned foe and on Intimidation checks to Demoralize them. You have a -1 circumstance penalty to Perception checks to Seek creatures other than your condemned foe and on Intimidation checks to Demoralize anyone other than your condemned foe.

You typically can use Harsh Judgment only during an encounter, and if you try to use it to declare someone's life forfeit during exploration or downtime, you are likely to start an encounter.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.raoz523QRsj5WjcF]{效果: Harsh Judgement}

Hidden Thorn.name: 隐刺于臂 Hidden Thorn
Hidden Thorn.description: 有些花可以隐藏它们的刺，而你的棘刺恰好隐藏在你的手臂上。你获得可造成1d6点穿刺伤害的非武装攻击“棘刺”。你的棘刺属于刀类武器组，并具有娴熟和无武装特性。

Hijack Undead.name: 劫持死灵 Hijack Undead
Hijack Undead.description:
频率 每小时一次

你的发条装置可以强行掌控不死生物的身体，让他们服从你的意志。对一个相邻不死生物进行近战打击。如果打击命中且目标等级不高于你的等级-3，则目标它将被你@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.9qGBRpbX9NEwtAAr]{控制 Controlled}。它可以尝试一次@Check[type:will|dc:resolve(@actor.attributes.classOrSpellDC.value)]豁免，对抗你的职业DC或法术DC来抵抗你的控制。如果目标已经在其他人的控制下，控制者也将尝试一次豁免骰，不死生物将使用两次豁免骰更高的那一次作为结果。

大成功 目标不受影响并且临时免疫24小时。

成功 目标不受影响。

失败 不死生物变成你控制的仆从，持续1分钟。如果你的盟友攻击不死仆从，控制结束。

大失败 类似失败，但持续时间1小时。

Hilt Hammer.name: 剑柄槌击 Hilt Hammer
Hilt Hammer.description: 你知道如何用任意武器来敲碎骨骼。你使用的近战武器获得多用B特征。你只能在进行近战攻击时使用该武器来造成钝击伤害。根据GM的判断，特定的武器可能无法获得多用B特征。

Hypnotic Lure.name: Hypnotic Lure
Hypnotic Lure.description:
频率 每小时一次

Your unblinking gaze is so intense it can befuddle the mind of others, drawing your victims toward you even against their better judgment. You stare at a creature within 30 feet. The target must attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:resolve(@actor.attributes.classOrSpellDC.value)] save against the higher of your class DC or spell DC.

成功 The target is unaffected.

失败 On its turn, the target must spend its first action to approach you. It can't Delay or take reactions until it has done so.

大失败 The target must use all its actions on its next turn to approach you. It can't Delay or take any reactions until it has reached a space that's adjacent to you (or as close to you as possible if it reaches an impassable barrier).

Improved Hijack Undead.name: 精通劫持死灵 Improved Hijack Undead
Improved Hijack Undead.description: 不死生物几乎无法违抗你的命令。当你使用劫持死灵专长时，如果不死生物豁免失败，它成为你的仆从10分钟。如果大失败，它将成为你的仆从24小时。

Incredible Reanimated Companion.name: 惊人赋生伙伴 Incredible Reanimated Companion
Incredible Reanimated Companion.description: 你在你赋生伙伴坏死的肉体中注入奇怪的化学物质，并微调它体内的发条装置，全面增强它的能力。它成为惊人构装伙伴。

Iron Lung.name: 钢铁肺 Iron Lung
Iron Lung.description: 你的肺部被赋予了钢铁的恢复力。将你对抗吸入类毒素的豁免检定结果当做比掷骰结果更高一级的成功结算。除此之外，你获得@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.adventure-specific-actions.aCFKA59YgGDNnSJ8]{呼吐毒素 Exhale Poison}能力。

It's Alive!.name: 它活了！ It's Alive!
It's Alive!.description: 你已经精通了利用电能为你的发条装置提供动力的方法。当你的构装伙伴受到电击伤害时，它获得等同于电击伤害一半或等同于你等级的临时生命值，以较低的为准。这些临时生命值持续最多1分钟。

Jungle Runner.name: Jungle Runner
Jungle Runner.description: You run through the jungle as easily as you would through an open field. You ignore difficult terrain from underbrush within forests and jungles. You can always use the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.ust1jJSCZQUhBZIz]{Take Cover} action when you're within forest or jungle terrain to gain cover, even if you aren't adjacent to an obstacle you can Take Cover behind.

Kashrishi Revivification.name: Kashrishi Revivification
Kashrishi Revivification.description:
频率 每天一次

触发 You have the dying condition and are about to attempt a recovery check. You can use Kashrishi Revivification even if you're otherwise unable to act.

The well of psychic energy held within your mind can exceed the limitations of your physical body. You're restored to 1 Hit Point, lose the dying and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{失去意识 Unconscious} conditions, and can act normally on this turn. You gain or increase the wounded condition as normal for losing the dying condition.

Keep Pace (Game Hunter).name: Keep Pace (Game Hunter)
Keep Pace (Game Hunter).description:
When your hunted prey tries to bolt, you follow. You Stride up to your Speed, following your hunted prey and keeping it in reach throughout its movement until it stops moving or you've moved your full Speed.

You can use Keep Pace to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.H6v1VgowHaKHnVlG]{Burrow}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.pprgrYQ1QnIDGZiy]{Climb}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.cS9nfDRGD83bNU1p]{Fly}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.c8TGiZ48ygoSPofx]{Swim} instead of Stride if you have the appropriate movement type.

Legendary Size.name: Legendary Size
Legendary Size.description: The vanaras of old were tricksters able to step across wide rivers or slip into impossibly small spaces. You can cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.wzctak6BxOW8xvFV]{Enlarge} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.PjhUmyKnq6K5uDby]{Shrink} once per day each as 2nd-level divine innate spells. You can target only yourself and other vanaras with these spells.

Legs of Stone.name: 磐石腿 Legs of Stone
Legs of Stone.description: 你在对抗@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.7blmbDrQFNfdT731]{推撞 Shove}或是@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.ge56Lu1xXVFYUnLP]{摔绊 Trip}的强韧和反射豁免上获得+2状态加值。即使你没有一只手空着，也可以推撞生物。当你成功推撞一个敌人时，你可以行走离开你的对手（而不是走向它），但你必须向你推撞它的反方向移动同样的距离。

Lion's Fury.name: Lion's Fury
Lion's Fury.description: You gain access to the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Ak3oHoPDJoMR14yg]{Lion Scythe's} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.zWp7Kcn7mhKyGFxW]{Sun Sling's} critical specialization effects.

Lion's Might.name: Lion's Might
Lion's Might.description: You've trained with the weapons of the Bright Lions. You gain access to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Ak3oHoPDJoMR14yg]{Lion Scythes} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.zWp7Kcn7mhKyGFxW]{Sun Slings}. Whenever you gain a class feature that grants you expert or greater proficiency in certain weapons, you also gain that proficiency rank with lion scythes and sun slings.

Log Roll.name: 滚木术 Log Roll
Log Roll.description:
需求 你和一个相邻的生物都位于一个狭窄表面或是不稳地面上，并且那个生物处于措手不及状态。

你改变双足的姿势来移动脚下的地表，或是通过其他某种方式使得你的对手失去稳定。进行一次特技检定来对抗相邻生物的反射豁免DC。成功时，该生物倒地。大失败时，你倒地。

Look But Don't Touch.name: 可远观而不可亵玩 Look But Don't Touch
Look But Don't Touch.description:
频率 每天一次

许多花看起来很漂亮，但触摸起来却很要命——而你就是其中之一。在1分钟内，任何使用没有长触及特性的近战武器或以近战无武装攻击接触你或伤害你的生物都会受到[[/r 3d6[poison]]]伤害。

Masquerade of Seasons Stance.name: Masquerade of Seasons Stance
Masquerade of Seasons Stance.description:
You have mastered the opening steps to the Masquerade of Seasons, a dance that channels the power of spring, summer, winter, and autumn. Choose one of the following traits: water, fire, negative, or cold. You gain resistance 5 to damage dealt by effects with the chosen trait. You can use an action to reenter this stance at any time, changing the granted resistance to another of the available options. If you are at least 12th level, the granted resistance increases to be equal to half your level.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.6IsZQpwRJQWIzdGx]{Stance: Masquerade of Seasons Stance}

prerequisites.value: 表演技能熟练度为受训

Mental Sustenance.name: Mental Sustenance
Mental Sustenance.description: You can sustain yourself with the power of your mind. You need only a single serving of food and water each week to avoid starvation or dehydration. You can hold your breath for an additional 5 rounds before running out of air.

Mighty Wings.name: Mighty Wings
Mighty Wings.description: Your dragon wings are now a permanent part of your body, giving you a fly Speed equal to your Speed. If you spend 1 Focus Point to cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.HWJODX2zPg5cg34F]{Dragon Wings}, your fly Speed increases to 90 feet for the duration, unless your Speed is faster, and you gain the effects of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.K8vvrOgW4bGakXxm]{Dragon Claws} for the duration.

Mimic Protections.name: Mimic Protections
Mimic Protections.description: By adopting resonant reflections, you have learned to copy the abilities of other creatures as well. When you use @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.JYi4MnsdFu618hPm]{Hunt Prey} on a foe within 100 feet, you gain resistance 10 to all damage types that target has resistance or immunity to for as long as the foe remains within 100 feet.

Miraculous Repair.name: Miraculous Repair
Miraculous Repair.description: Geniekin can't grant magical wishes, but some echo of power lingers within you. Faced with a mechanism that is damaged but not destroyed, you can wish it back into a functional state for a period of 10 minutes. The object must be mundane and no larger than 5 Bulk, such as a disabled locking mechanism in a door. For 10 minutes, the object functions as it should, ignoring any damage to its mechanism. This doesn't grant you any knowledge of what a device might do or how it ought to function. Once the 10 minutes are up, the object falls back into disrepair and is temporarily immune to Miraculous Repair for 1 day.

Molten Wit.name: Molten Wit
Molten Wit.description: Your elemental soul has sparked not just your body but also your mind. You either become trained in Deception and gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.B6HbYsLBWb1RR6Fx]{Charming Liar} skill feat, or you become trained in Diplomacy and gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.KpFetnUqTiweypZk]{Group Impression} skill feat. If you're already trained in one of these skills, you must take the other and can choose from either skill feat. If you're trained in both skills, you become trained in a different skill of your choice instead and can choose from either skill feat.

Monkey Spirits.name: Monkey Spirits
Monkey Spirits.description: Vanaras generally consider the spirits of departed monkeys to be less informative or interesting than their own ancestors traveling the cycles of existence, yet these monkey spirits can prove useful when the situation is dire. You can cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.tFKJCPvOQZxKq6ON]{Mad Monkeys} once per day as a 5th-level primal innate spell. You become an expert in primal spell DCs and primal spell attack rolls. If you choose flagrant burglary for this casting of mad monkeys, you can have the monkeys use your Thievery modifier instead of your spell DC – 10.

Murderous Thorns.name: 致命棘刺 Murderous Thorns
Murderous Thorns.description: 你有很多棘刺，它们恶毒而锋利。如果你有隐刺于臂专长，你的棘刺攻击会获得致命的d6特性。如果你有带刺玫瑰传承，你可以每小时使用一次@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.ncdryKskPwHMgHFh]{险恶棘刺 Wicked Thorns}反应。

Nagaji Lore.name: Nagaji Lore
Nagaji Lore.description: You're the vassal or apprentice of a learned naga, and you've studied the secrets of naga magic and concocting intricate poisons. You gain the trained proficiency rank in Crafting and Occultism. If you would automatically become trained in one of those skills (from your background or class, for example), you become trained in a skill of your choice. You also become trained in your choice of Nagaji Lore or Naga Lore.

Nagaji Spell expertise.name: Nagaji Spell expertise
Nagaji Spell expertise.description: Your magical skill rivals that of accomplished naga spellcasters. During your daily preparations, choose @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.zR67Rt3UMHKC5evy]{Blink}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.zfn5RqAdF63neqpP]{Control Water}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.GP3wewkQXEPrLxYj]{Subconscious Suggestion}. You can Cast this Spell as a 5th-level occult innate spell once that day. You become an expert in occult spell DCs and occult spell attack rolls.

Nagaji Spell Familiarity.name: Nagaji Spell Familiarity
Nagaji Spell Familiarity.description: Either through study, exposure, or familial devotion, you have the magic of nagas bubbling in your blood. During your daily preparations, choose @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.4gBIw4IDrSfFHik4]{Daze}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Yb0C1uLzeHrVLl7a]{Detect Magic}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.pwzdSlJgYqN7bs2w]{Mage Hand}. Until your next daily preparations, you can cast the chosen spell as an occult innate cantrip. A cantrip is heightened to a spell level equal to half your level rounded up.

Nagaji Spell Mysteries.name: Nagaji Spell Mysteries
Nagaji Spell Mysteries.description: You've learned more naga magic. During your daily preparations, choose @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.vLA0q0WOK2YPuJs6]{Charm}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.aEM2cttJ2eYcLssW]{Fleet Step}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.rfZpqmj0AIIdkVIs]{Heal}. You can cast the chosen spell as a 1st-level occult innate spell once that day.

prerequisites.value: at least one innate spell from a nagaji heritage or ancestry feat

Necromantic Bulwark.name: 阻挡死灵 Necromantic Bulwark
Necromantic Bulwark.description: 经常承受死灵术的效果让你能更好地抵御它们。当你举起你的盾牌，你在对抗会造成负能量伤害的效果时的豁免检定，可以增加盾牌的环境加值。如果你有盾牌格挡反应，你在受到负能量伤害时也可以触发该反应，即使这不是物理伤害。

No Stranger to Death.name: 习惯死亡 No Stranger to Death
No Stranger to Death.description: 你经常接触潜在的不死生物腐烂物中，习惯了它们的影响。你在对抗具有死亡、疾病和邪恶特征的法术和效果的豁免检定中，获得+2环境加值。当你陷入流失或恶心时，你由于这种状态遭受的状态减值减少1，最小到0。

Noble Resolve.name: Noble Resolve
Noble Resolve.description: Once, genies ruled vast kingdoms, and a remnant of that confidence and power is reflected in your strong will. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Will saves against effects with the mental trait. Regardless of success or failure, you become aware of the person who used the effect on you if they were visible to you at the time of use.

Nonlethal Takedown.name: 非致命制服 Nonlethal Takedown
Nonlethal Takedown.description: 你更喜欢使用非致命的手段对付活着的敌人，但你携带的武器对不死生物而言足够致命。当使用没有非致命特性的武器进行非致命攻击时，你不会受到正常的-2环境减值。

Open Mind.name: Open Mind
Open Mind.description: You have inherent psychic abilities that allow you to tap into the power of your mind. Choose one cantrip from the occult spell list. You can cast this spell as an occult innate spell at will. A cantrip is heightened to a spell level equal to half your level rounded up.

Paragon Reanimated Companion.name: 典范赋生伙伴 Paragon Reanimated Companion
Paragon Reanimated Companion.description: 你已经达到了亡灵科学的顶峰，创造了一个前所未有的机械丧尸。你的赋生构装伙伴将会成为典范构装伙伴。

Perfect Weaponry.name: Perfect Weaponry
Perfect Weaponry.description: You gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.YW4FdWgzTwRFneFF]{Monastic Weaponry} monk class feat. You can use melee monk weapons with any Student of Perfection feats or Student of Perfection focus spells that normally require unarmed attacks.

Performance Weapon Expert.name: Performance Weapon Expert
Performance Weapon Expert.description: Your experience has made you better with a wide variety of weapons. Your proficiency ranks for simple weapons and martial weapons increase to expert, as does your proficiency rank for your chosen advanced weapon.

prerequisites.value: 任意武器或无武装打击的熟练度为专家

Perfume Cloud.name: 芬芳之云 Perfume Cloud
Perfume Cloud.description:
频率 每小时一次

你喷出一团你的香气，就像全身都在打喷嚏一样——但这可能会救你一命，因为强力的香气会让攻击者的眼睛感到刺痛和流泪。植物和真菌免疫此效果，但@Template[type:emanation|distance:10]范围内的所有其他生物必须尝试进行一次对抗你的职业DC或法术DC（以较高者为准）的@Check[type:fortitude|dc:resolve(@actor.attributes.classOrSpellDC.value)]豁免，豁免结果如下。

大成功 目标不受影响。

成功 目标@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{目眩 Dazzled}1轮。

失败 目标目眩并只能看十尺远持续1轮。

大失败 目标@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{目盲 Blinded}1轮。

Pirouette.name: Pirouette
Pirouette.description:
需求 You're in Masquerade of Seasons Stance.

触发 An enemy targets you with a Strike.

You twirl gracefully, spinning on one foot to evade your opponent's attack. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to AC against the triggering attack. If the attack misses you, you can immediately Step. If the attack hits you anyway, reduce the damage it deals by an amount equal to half your level; this reduction in damage is applied after calculating immunities, resistances, and weakness.

Practiced Opposition.name: 熟练应对 Practiced Opposition
Practiced Opposition.description: 你与不死生物搏斗的次数比你记得的还多，你的敌人不会给你几乎任何准备时间，你必须依靠经验和肌肉记忆来引导你的利刃。对一个你能看见的不死生物，尝试一次回忆知识检定，然后对它进行打击。如果你回忆知识的尝试成功，目标抵抗你这次打击的抗力降低5。目标在接下来的24小时内对你的熟练应对免疫。

Predict Weather.name: 预测天气 Predict Weather
Predict Weather.description:
通过观察环境中通常微不可查的迹象，你可以尝试着预测当日的天气。在户外花费10分钟，然后尝试一次@Check[type:survival|dc:20]检定。（如果你能鸟瞰该地区，则这一检定降低为@Check[type:survival|dc:15]；但如果条件较差，例如在能见度受限的情况下预测天气，则这一检定将提高到@Check[type:survival|dc:30]）。一旦你尝试预测天气，你24小时之内不能再次尝试。

大成功 你精准地预测了当天的降水、温度和风况。你能够得知未来24小时内该地区是否会发生天气事件，如果会发生，则能得知会发生哪个事件，大概什么时候会发生。你在准备应对该天气事件的生存检定上获得+2环境加值。

成功 你精准地预测了当天的降水、温度和风况。你能够得知未来24小时内该地区是否会发生天气事件，但不知道会发生哪个事件，也不知道该事件会何时发生。你在准备应对该天气事件的生存检定上获得+1环境加值。

大失败 你的结论错得离谱。GM就好像你获得了大成功一般向你提供了一个当天不会发生的天气事件的各种信息和细节（作为替代，一个不同的事件发生、亦或是无事发生。）

prerequisites.value: 生存技能熟练度为受训

Preventative Treatment.name: 预防疗法 Preventative Treatment
Preventative Treatment.description: 你提供了预防性的治疗和护理，帮助你的病人抵抗将来的疾病。你对一个目标还没有的状态进行处理状态，指定任何你通常可以用处理状态处理的状态。反制检定获得秘密特征，因此GM需要私下掷骰。在该生物的下一分钟内的下一次将要受到该状态的影响时，你的治疗将立即尝试减少状态值，使用秘密检定的结果作为处理状态的效果。预防疗法在一个生物身上能持续1分钟，直到效果被应用，或者直到你再次对该生物使用预防疗法，以先发生者为准。

Prismatic Scales.name: Prismatic Scales
Prismatic Scales.description: You can cause your scales to glow with scintillating, many-hued colors, protecting you from energy while dazzling foes. Once per day, you can cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.4nEY2BcV85wavKLO]{Prismatic Armor} as an occult innate spell, except the spell alters the coloration of your scales instead of causing you to be clad in armor. This difference is cosmetic, and the spell has all the same effects as normal.

Puncturing Horn.name: Puncturing Horn
Puncturing Horn.description:
While many kashrishi never use their horns for more than cracking open hard-shelled fruits or amplifying their psychic powers, you've practiced using yours offensively. You gain a horn unarmed attack that deals 1d6 piercing damage. Your horn is in the brawling group and has the finesse and unarmed traits.

特殊 If you have the xyloshi heritage, your horn instead deals 1d8 piercing damage.

Push Back the Dead!.name: 打退它们！ Push Back the Dead!
Push Back the Dead!.description:
你对你的盟友大声疾呼，增强他他们的决心和能力，以抵御不死生物的可怕诡计。盟友在对抗来自不死生物的效果时，豁免获得+2环境加值。他们还能在抵抗不死生物的打击时获得等于你魅力调整值一半的抗力。

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.OeZ0E1oUKyGPxPy0]{效果: 打退它们！}

Quicken Heartbeat.name: 加快心跳 Quicken Heartbeat
Quicken Heartbeat.description:
频率 每轮一次

你将心脏替换成了活动的水银和金刚石的造物。你降低你的@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed}状态1。另外，如果你不处于缓慢状态，你在下一回合当中将处于@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.nlCjDvLMf2EkV2dl]{迅捷 Quickened 1}状态，并可以使用你的额外动作来行走或是打击。

Ragdya's Dance.name: Ragdya's Dance
Ragdya's Dance.description:
频率 每小时一次

触发 An adjacent observed creature succeeds at an attack roll against you.

Even when faced with deadly danger, you fight with the rapturous laughter of Ragdya in your heart and can play impossible tricks. After resolving the successful attack, the triggering creature must attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:resolve(@actor.attributes.classOrSpellDC.value)] save against the higher of your class DC or your spell DC. On a failure, you and the triggering creature switch places. You and the triggering creature must each be able to fit in the new space, and your positions must be unoccupied.

Ragdya's Revelry.name: Ragdya's Revelry
Ragdya's Revelry.description:
频率 每天一次

触发 An adjacent creature you can see fails an attack roll against you.

You dart away from your foe's attack with a casual laugh, using the opening to cause mischief. You attempt to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.RDXXE7wMrSPCLv5k]{Steal} an item from the triggering creature, ignoring the usual restriction that the creature can't be in combat.

Rakshasa Ravaged.name: Rakshasa Ravaged
Rakshasa Ravaged.description: You and your family know well the ravages of rakshasa predations, and you know how to best defend yourself against their growing corruption in the world. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to saving throws against occult spells.

prerequisites.value: 神秘技能熟练度为专家

Reclaim Spell.name: Reclaim Spell
Reclaim Spell.description:
You have learned to manipulate reflections of magic, similar to the resonant reflections. You reclaim the magic of an ongoing spell, using it reprepare a spell with a duration.

You Dismiss a Spell of 4th level or lower that you cast today from a spell slot with at least half its duration remaining, even if that spell can't normally be Dismissed.

You can then spend 10 minutes to reprepare the spell in that spell slot, as @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.a1TSGGsA6b5gjP3H]{Reprepare Spell}.

Reclaimant Plea.name: 复国祈愿 Reclaimant Plea
Reclaimant Plea.description:
你呼唤绯红誓言的力量来获得魔法帮助。选择下列法术之一：@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.b5sGjGlBf58f8jn0]{凌空而行 Air Walk}、@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.ksLCg62cLOojw3gN]{次元锚 Dimensional Anchor}、@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.aqRYNoSvxsVfqglH]{行动自如 Freedom of Movement}、@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.XXqE1eY3w3z6xJCB]{隐形术 Invisibility}、@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.OyFCwQuw8XRazsNr]{移除诅咒 Remove Curse}、@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.DyiD239dNS7RIxZE]{灼热光辉 Searing Light}。你每天可以将该其作为4环内在神术法术施放一次。14级时，升阶到5环；16级时，升阶到6环。但如果你激怒了绯红誓言的神秘来源，你会失去施放法术的能力，直到你赎罪。

特殊 你可以在14级时第二次选择此专长，你从以上列表、@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.YvXKGlHOt7mdW2jZ]{防死结界 Death Ward}、或@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.E3X2RbzWHCdz7gsk]{焰击术 Flame Strike}中选取第二个法术，并且能每天使用一次；你的神术的法术DC和法术攻击的熟练提升至专家。你可以在18级时第三次选择此专长，你从以上列表、防死结界、焰击术、或@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.a3aQxCpoj1q1NQxC]{阳炎爆 Sunburst}中选取第三个法术，并且能每天使用一次；此外，从该专长获取的三个法术都升阶到7环，你的神术的法术dc和法术攻击的熟练提升至大师。

Reflecting Riposte.name: Reflecting Riposte
Reflecting Riposte.description:
触发 An opponent casts a spell and you critically succeed at a saving throw against it.

需求 You have a shield raised or are benefiting from Dueling Parry or Twin Parry.

You attempt to counteract the triggering spell using powerful magical techniques observed in the Kortos Mounts. Use your attack roll modifier with your shield or parrying weapon for your counteract check. If you counteract the spell, it is reflected upon the caster. If the spell targeted individual creatures, it targets the caster only. If the spell targeted an area centered on a point, the new area is centered on the caster. If the spell was a cone or line, the cone or line emanates from you toward the caster. If the spell has a save DC, it uses your class DC, and if it requires a spell attack roll, use the same attack roll modifier as the counteract check.

prerequisites.value: 决斗反击, 镜反之盾, 或双重反击

Reimagine.name: Reimagine
Reimagine.description: You can cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.y0Vy7iNL3ET8K00C]{Dreaming Potential} as an innate occult spell. You can cast this spell targeting yourself as your last activity before falling asleep to receive its normal benefits and effects.

Reminder of the Greater Fear.name: Reminder of the Greater Fear
Reminder of the Greater Fear.description:
频率 once per 10 minutes

触发 Another creature within 30 feet of you that can see you would gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened} condition.

You give a target a stern glower to remind them that it is you, and no one else, they should truly fear. Reduce the value of the frightened condition the creature would take by 1.

prerequisites.value: 威吓技能熟练度为大师

Repulse the Wicked.name: 邪灵辟易 Repulse the Wicked
Repulse the Wicked.description:
触发 你触及内的一个不死生物对你的一次攻击骰大失败。

你在敌人失败时趁机驱离他们。你尝试@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.7blmbDrQFNfdT731]{推撞 Shove}该不死生物。

Resolute Defender.name: 坚定防御者 Resolute Defender
Resolute Defender.description: 信仰与信念之力支撑着你的盾牌，在今天的胜利到来前，木和铁不得碎裂。如果一个盾牌因为在你的盾牌格挡中受到伤害而被摧毁，那么它会保持完好，并具有1点HP。它的结构会变得很脆弱，需要你花费时间将其修复，所以直至你下次进行日常准备为止，你无法使用坚定防御者来再次保护同一面盾牌。

Reveal Hidden Self.name: Reveal Hidden Self
Reveal Hidden Self.description:
需求 You're @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{藏匿 Hidden} to at least one enemy.

While hidden, you manifest a version of your animalistic nature. You create an illusion of a Large or smaller creature within 60 feet of your location with the effects of the illusory creature spell. The creature shares your animalistic beastbrood features. Unlike most actions taken while hidden, using Reveal Hidden Self and Sustaining the Spell don't automatically end your hidden condition. Use the higher of your class DC or spell DC against attempts to disbelieve the illusion. If a creature observes you, it automatically disbelieves the illusion, and if you're no longer hidden to at least one enemy, the effect ends.

Ringmaster's Introduction.name: Ringmaster's Introduction
Ringmaster's Introduction.description:
需求 The ally hasn't acted in the current combat.

触发 An ally's turn begins.

You announce the triggering ally with a litany of their legendary achievements, spurring them to action. The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.nlCjDvLMf2EkV2dl]{迅捷 Quickened} this turn and can spend the extra action to Stride, Strike, Demoralize, Feint, or Perform.

Rokoan Arts.name: Rokoa的保佑 Rokoan Arts
Rokoan Arts.description: 祖灵开始聚集在你的身上，赐予你rokoa特有的力量。你每天可以将用内在原能法术的方式各施展一次@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.BBvV7qoXGdw09q1C]{动物交谈 Speak with Animals}和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.HTou8cG05yuSkesj]{关照术 Status}。

Roll With it (Kingmaker).name: 乘势移形 Roll With it (拥王者)
Roll With it (Kingmaker).description:
触发 一个被你作为猎杀目标的巨人使用近战攻击命中你。

你可以躲避巨人的攻击。尝试进行DC为10+巨人攻击加值的反射豁免。如果检定结果允许你将行走作为该反应动作的一部分，同时你拥有飞行或游泳移动方式，那么你可以将行走改为对应的移动方式。

大成功 攻击没能命中你（如果该攻击为重击，则改为普通命中）。你可以将行走10尺作为该反应动作的一部分。如果你这样做，该反应动作具有移动特征。

成功 攻击造成一半的伤害。你可以将行走5尺作为该反应动作的一部分。如果你这样做，该反应动作具有移动特征。

大失败 你没能躲避攻击，被击@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{倒地 Prone}。

Ruby Resurrection.name: Ruby Resurrection
Ruby Resurrection.description:
频率 每天一次

触发 You would be reduced to 0 Hit Points.

In a burst of flame, you return to health like a phoenix rising from the ashes. Change your current Hit Points to 30 and cast a 6th-level fireball centered on yourself. This fireball doesn't affect you. Your hair turns brilliant red for 1 hour.

If you haven't used Ruby Resurrection and you die, you stay in initiative order and Ruby Resurrection triggers automatically at the start of your next turn, bringing you back to life at 0 HP before having its normal effects. This happens only if there are some remains to resurrect; for instance, if you were killed by disintegrate you wouldn't return.

特殊 This feat has the trait corresponding to the tradition of spells you cast.

Sacred Armaments.name: 神圣武装 Sacred Armaments
Sacred Armaments.description: 通过信仰力量或牧师祝福，你的武器可以有效对抗虚体生物。你持用的武器获得幽冥性能符文。

Say That Again!.name: Say That Again!
Say That Again!.description:
触发 An opponent gets a critical failure when attempting to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.2u915NdUyQan6uKF]{挫败士气 Demoralize} you or Lie to you.

The world is full of obnoxious weasels who think they can pull one over on you-put them in their place! When an adjacent creature attempts to Lie to you or to Demoralize you and gets a critical failure on the roll, you can use your reaction to make a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.7blmbDrQFNfdT731]{推撞 Shove} attempt against that opponent. If combat results, you can roll Intimidation for your initiative check.

prerequisites.value: 运动技能熟练度为专家

Scuttle Up.name: Scuttle Up
Scuttle Up.description: Your environment requires you to climb cave walls or tree trunks with great regularity. You gain a Climb speed of 10 feet.

Self Destruct.name: 自毁 Self Destruct
Self Destruct.description:
触发 你的赋生发条伙伴生命值减少至0。

需求 你和赋生发条伙伴的距离不超过60尺。

你在构装伙伴中安装了一个自毁装置，你能用一个特殊的起爆器在至多60尺远距离内引爆它。当你启动该装置时，你的赋生构装伙伴会爆炸，对@Template[type:emanation|distance:30]{30尺半径}内所有生物造成每等级[[/r 2d6[fire]]]伤害。范围内的生物能尝试@Check[type:reflex|dc:resolve(@actor.attributes.classOrSpellDC.value)]豁免，其DC等于你的职业DC或法术DC中更高的那个。

[[/r ((2*@actor.level)d6)[fire]]]{按等级计算的火焰伤害}

Serpent's Tongue.name: Serpent's Tongue
Serpent's Tongue.description: You subconsciously flick your tongue through the air to taste the world around you. You gain imprecise scent with a range of 30 feet.

Serpentcoil Slam.name: Serpentcoil Slam
Serpentcoil Slam.description:
频率 每分钟一次

Your people's ancient and storied rivalry with garudas led you to develop special techniques against flying foes. Make a melee Strike against a flying creature up to one size larger than you; if you hit, you use your neck or coils to smash the creature into the ground. In addition to the normal effects of your Strike, the creature moves to the nearest unoccupied ground space adjacent to you and can't Fly, levitate, or otherwise leave the ground for 1 round. On a critical hit, it can't Fly, levitate, or otherwise leave the ground for 1 minute.

Serpentine Swimmer.name: Serpentine Swimmer
Serpentine Swimmer.description: You undulate your body in a series of sinuous serpentine motions as you swim, drastically improving the speed at which you move through the water. Your swim Speed increases from 10 feet to 25 feet.

Shape of the Cloud Dragon.name: Shape of the Cloud Dragon
Shape of the Cloud Dragon.description:
You've discovered how to transform yourself into a cloud dragon. 每天一次, you can cast 7th-level @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.5c692cCcTDXjSEzk]{Dragon Form} as an innate arcane spell, transforming into a cloud dragon. The spell automatically heightens to 8th level if you're 16th level and 9th level if you're 18th level.

On a critical hit with an unarmed Strike gained from dragon form, you recharge the spell's breath weapon immediately.

While in this form, you gain the following cloud dragon–specific abilities:

  • Cloud cloud walk (you can walk on clouds or fog);
    • Melee 1 啃咬 Jaws, Damage 2d10 piercing plus 1d12 electricity;
    • Melee 1 爪抓 Claw (灵巧), Damage 3d10 slashing;
    • Melee 1 tail (reach 10 feet), Damage 3d10 bludgeoning;
    • Melee 1 horn (reach 10 feet), Damage 3d8 piercing;
    • Breath Weapon 30-foot cone, 6d12 electricity.

特殊 You can use this feat in place of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.eR0sifECG27CC4do]{Shape Of The Dragon} to fulfill feat requirements.

Shepherd of Desolation.name: 荒坟牧首 Shepherd of Desolation
Shepherd of Desolation.description: 你知道如何让人们在死坟末土最浑浊的阴影中存活。位于你@Template[type:emanation|distance:10]{10尺}内的盟友获得@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.n7LTwKUSATLaQ9FD]{寂灭求生 Survivor of Desolation}的好处。如果你是神卫，那么这个灵光也属于神卫灵光，即使你是作为复国骑士而非神卫获得的。

Shieldmarshal Dedication.name: 盾勋执法官入门 Shieldmarshal Dedication
Shieldmarshal Dedication.description: 你的精英盾勋执法官训练使你在霾都的污秽和天城城的繁华中同样自如。你对这个城市迷宫般的街道和法规非常熟悉。你在社群上获得受训熟练度；如果你已经获得受训，则你在社群上获得专家熟练度。在城市环境中，你可以尝试用社群检定来@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.fJImDBQfqfjKJOhk]{感知方向 Sense Direction}。你也获得了@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.JtjnFsOToBLnSRO9]{贵族风范 Courtly Graces}和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.X2jGFfLU5qI5XVot]{人情练达 Streetwise}技能专长。

Silent Stone.name: Silent Stone
Silent Stone.description: You've lived in the shadow of the Shattered Range, and the patience of those ancient mountains expresses itself in your stillness. Your body might have veins of granite, sandstone, or similar sedimentary rocks that make it easier for you to camouflage yourself in certain regions. You become trained in Stealth, and you gain the Terrain Stalker skill feat. If you're already trained in Stealth from another source, you become trained in a skill of your choice instead.

Skilled Climber.name: Skilled Climber
Skilled Climber.description: You can navigate vertical surfaces with ease. You gain a climb Speed of 10 feet. If you also have the Scuttle Up ancestry feat, your climb Speed increases to your land Speed when climbing trees or cavern walls.

Skillful Climber.name: Skillful Climber
Skillful Climber.description: You can scamper up or down surfaces as nimbly as a monkey. You gain a climb Speed of 10 feet. If you have the Climber's Tail ancestry feat, your total climb Speed increases to your land Speed when climbing trees.

Skin Split.name: Skin Split
Skin Split.description:
频率 每天一次

You claw open the top layer of your scales and peel off the premature shed in order to remove harmful substances from your skin. You immediately end all persistent damage from effects that coat your skin (such as fire and most persistent acid damage). If you're suffering from an effect other than persistent damage that depends on continuous contact with your skin, and if that effect allows a saving throw, immediately attempt a new saving throw against that effect.

Social Camouflage.name: Social Camouflage
Social Camouflage.description: You have the uncanny ability to quickly blend into the lifestyle of whatever settlement in which you find yourself. After residing in a particular settlement for at least 1 day, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to checks to Impersonate to pass yourself off as a resident of that settlement. Additionally, you can use Deception in place of Diplomacy to Gather Information while in that settlement. The GM might decide you need more time in particularly large settlements to gain these benefits, or might decide you gain the benefits only while in a specific district or part of the settlement.

Solcar Rejuvenation.name: Solcar Rejuvenation
Solcar Rejuvenation.description: The warmth and light of the sun gives you life. If you rest outdoors for 10 minutes during the day, you regain Hit Points equal to your [[/r (floor(@actor.level/2)*@actor.con.mod)[Healing]]]{Constitution modifier × half your level}. You gain this benefit in addition to any healing from @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.1kGNdIIhuglAjIp9]{Treat Wounds}.

Speak With Flowers.name: 与花相谈 Speak With Flowers
Speak With Flowers.description: 追溯你的本源，你是一朵被古老魔法活化的花朵，只要稍加努力，你就可以与你的亲族交谈。你可以向所有类型的开花植物提出问题，从中得到答案，并使用交涉技能。

Staggering Fire.name: 阻挠射击 Staggering Fire
Staggering Fire.description: 你学会了如何通过向敌人射击来减缓他们的速度，以帮助无辜受害者和骑士伙伴们有时间撤离。使用弓武器组中的一把武器进行一次远程打击。如果命中，目标的速度会获得-5尺的环境减值，直到它的回合结束；如果重击，则改成-10尺的环境减值。

Stalwart Standard.name: 坚定军旗 Stalwart Standard
Stalwart Standard.description: 你的旗帜会让你的敌人更难推动你的盟友，并鼓励你的盟友去保护无辜的人。受益于你骑兵旗帜专长的盟友，在对抗@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Dt6B1slsBy8ipJu9]{卸武 Disarm}、@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.PMbdMWc2QroouFGD]{擒拿 Grapple}、@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.7blmbDrQFNfdT731]{推撞 Shove}和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.ge56Lu1xXVFYUnLP]{摔绊 Trip}时，在强韧和反射DC上获得+1环境加值。如果有敌人在上一轮伤害了等级低于某个受益盟友的无辜者，该盟友在攻击该敌人时，攻击检定获得+1状态加值，如；被召唤的生物、仆从、或者你或你的盟友为了获得这个加成而故意放任的生物不计。

Steal Essence.name: Steal Essence
Steal Essence.description:
需求 A magic item is within your reach.

Being in the presence of the aeon orbs as they deteriorated has taught you how to siphon energy, and you do so with the required magic item. The DC to steal the properties of a magic item is equal to the DC for the item's level or the normal DC to Steal the item, whichever is higher. The targeted item then becomes temporarily immune for 24 hours. If the object was on a creature, that creature is also temporarily immune (which prevents you from attempting to Steal the Essence of another object on it).

If you successfully steal the properties of an item, it loses its magical properties for 24 hours and you can move those properties to a non-magical object of the same general kind (such as moving a hat's properties to another piece of headgear or moving a weapon's properties to another weapon) for the same length of time. If the moved properties are counteracted, they return immediately to the original item. You automatically fail to Steal the Essence of an artifact, cursed item, or similar item.

prerequisites.value: 贼活技能熟练度为传奇
奥法、自然、神秘或宗教技能熟练度为大师

Strident Command.name: Strident Command
Strident Command.description:
The common folk heed your demands, and though your true foes rarely bend to your commands, when they do the hesitation can cost them the battle. You can cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.aIHY2DArKFweIrpf]{Command} once every 10 minutes as a 1st-level occult innate spell.

If you're in your vigilante identity, you can command the target only to approach you, drop prone, or stand in place. If you're in your social identity, you can command the target only to run away or release what the target is holding.

prerequisites.value: 威吓技能熟练度为大师

Stronger Debilitating Venom.name: Stronger Debilitating Venom
Stronger Debilitating Venom.description:
Add one of the following to the debilitations from which you can choose when you Envenom. These debilitations reduce the damage of all stages as noted.

  • Bungling (level 13) Reduce damage by 1 die

    Stage 1 no effect

    Stage 2 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 1}

    Stage 3 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 2}

  • Devitalizing (level 13) Reduce damage by 3 dice

    Stage 1 no effect

    Stage 2 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained 1}

    Stage 3 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained 2}

  • Nauseating (level 13) Reduce damage by 2 dice

    Stage 1 no effect

    Stage 2 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 1}

    Stage 3 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 2}

  • Weakening (level 13) Reduce damage by 1 die

    Stage 1 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 1}

    Stage 2 enfeebled 1

    Stage 3 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 2}

特殊 You can select this feat multiple times, choosing a different debilitation each time.

Sudden Mindfulness.name: Sudden Mindfulness
Sudden Mindfulness.description:
触发 You roll a success on a saving throw against an effect that would make you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AdPVz7rbaVSRxHFg]{迷魂 Fascinated} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{目眩 Dazzled}.

Your mind retains full awareness despite the best attempts of others, and your focus throws others off-balance. You get a critical success on the triggering saving throw, and if the triggering effect was caused by a creature, that creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Flat-Footed} to you until the end of your next turn.

Swift Application.name: Swift Application
Swift Application.description: You expertly combine the motions of attacking and coating your weapon with venom. You @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.s4V7JWSMF9JPJAeX]{Envenom} a weapon or piece of ammunition, and then Strike with that weapon. This counts against your uses of Envenom normally and can't be used if your venom is exhausted.

Tail Snatch.name: Tail Snatch
Tail Snatch.description: You can whip your tail around to lash items from the unwary's grip. You attempt to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Dt6B1slsBy8ipJu9]{Disarm} a creature, ignoring the requirement that you must have at least one hand free. As normal, your tail can't hold the items it disarms.

Telekinetic Slip.name: Telekinetic Slip
Telekinetic Slip.description:
频率 每天一次

触发 Your turn begins, and you're @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{擒抱 Grabbed} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{束缚 Restrained}.

A thin shell of telekinetic energy pushes from your skin, widening your enemy's grasp enough for you to slip free. You gain a +2 status bonus to checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Escape} from whatever has you grabbed or restrained. This bonus lasts until either you're no longer grabbed or restrained, or you fall @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{失去意识 Unconscious}.
